# resolveClassMethod(_:)

**Type Method**

Dynamically provides an implementation for a given selector for a class method.

## Declaration

```swift
class func resolveClassMethod(_ sel: Selector!) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **sel**: The name of a selector to resolve.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/YES] if the method was found and added to the receiver, otherwise [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NO].

## Discussion

This method allows you to dynamically provide an implementation for a given selector. See [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/resolveInstanceMethod(_:)] for further discussion.

## Dynamically Resolving Methods

- **resolveInstanceMethod(_:)**: Dynamically provides an implementation for a given selector for an instance method.
